"Sanctify the Lord of hosts Himself; and let Him be your fear, and let Him be your dread." Let us exalt the Lord as the One who has rightful dominion as the Supreme Ruler in His church. Shall not those who are soundly converted lift up their voices in an earnest effort to stay the awful deeds that are bringing the judgments of God upon our nation and upon the world? We seem as men who know not what the living out of the law means. Let Christ be exalted in His mediatorial work.--Letter 18a, 1906. 







Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
September 13, 1990. Entire Letter.
